content: this gorgeous crochet throw is anything but ordinary - and a stylish way to accent your decor stitched in cushy bernat blanket this crochet throw captures a beautiful contrast of color on a bold graphic backdrop worked flat a classic geometric motif is created in mosaic crochet featuring single_crochet and mosaic double_crochet to create a dramatic effect choose your colors and create s supremely comfortable addition to your home materials bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a purple nymph 11070 4 balls or 870 yds/795 m contrast b birch 10986 4 balls or 763 yds/698 m measurements approx 56 x 60 142 x 152 5 cm
